feed.title: Windhawk Mod Updates
feed.subtitle: Updates in the official collection of Windhawk mods

entry.title: Change Explorer Default Location 1.0.0
entry.content:
Change Explorer Default Location

This mod allows you to change the shell location or directory where Explorer starts. The directory can be either a regular path, or a shell location. A list of CLSIDs for shell locations in Windows 10 can be found here.

Shell locations must be prefixed with shell::: (e.g. shell:::{031E4825-7B94-4dc3-B131-E946B44C8DD5}).

entry.title: Open With - Remove Microsoft Store Menu Item 1.0.0
entry.content:
Open With - Remove Microsoft Store Menu Item

This mod removes the "Search with Microsoft Store" item from the "Open with" submenu in File Explorer. The item is unremovable by normal means (MUI/registry editing).

Before:

After:

entry.title: Fix browsers for Windows Classic theme 1.1
entry.content: add Skype

entry.title: Disable grouping on the taskbar 1.3.4
entry.content: • Fixed the "Pinned items remain in place" pinned items modes, for which the pinned items disappeared when running the program.

entry.title: Vertical Taskbar for Windows 11 1.0
entry.content:
Vertical Taskbar for Windows 11

Finally, the missing vertical taskbar option for Windows 11!

Compatibility

The mod was designed for up-to-date Windows 11 versions 22H2 and 23H2. Other versions weren't tested and are probably not compatible.

Some of the other taskbar mods, such as Taskbar height and icon size, aren't compatible with this mod.

Funding

The development of this mod was funded by AuthLite LLC. Thank you for contributing and allowing all Windhawk users to enjoy it!

entry.title: Aerexplorer 1.6.1
entry.content: Aerexplorer 1.6.1: Merge isCplHooks into efHooks

entry.title: Resource Redirect 1.1.4
entry.content: • Added support for using patterns for redirection, where '*' matches any number characters and '?' matches any single character, for example: C:\Programs\Firefox-Version-*\firefox.exe.

entry.title: Disable grouping on the taskbar 1.3.3
entry.content:
• Improved handling of pinned items in several cases such as virtual desktop switching and moving items between monitors.
  • Made the "Place ungrouped items together" option work on Windows 10.
  • Fixed icon not being restored after a window is closed if the "Use window icons" option is enabled.

entry.title: CE Disable Process Button Flashing 1.0.1
entry.content:
• CE Disable Process Button Flashing v1.0.1

Fix terminated offset according to Cheat Engine 7.5

  • Update version number

entry.title: CE Disable Process Button Flashing 1.0.0
entry.content:
CE Disable Process Button Flashing

When Cheat Engine is started, the Open Process button is flashed until the button is pressed:

This mod disables this flashing on the Open Process button.

entry.title: Classic Explorer navigation bar 1.0.3
entry.content: • Made compatible with Windows 11 24H2.

entry.title: Taskbar height and icon size 1.2.8
entry.content:
• Fixed the weather icon disappearing if taskbar icons are centered.
  • Added a restart prompt when the taskbar button width is changed in settings.

entry.title: Windows 11 Notification Center Styler 1.0.2
entry.content: • The mod now targets all ShellExperienceHost.exe windows, including the notification center, taskbar jump lists and notification popups.

entry.title: Windows 11 Taskbar Styler 1.3.4
entry.content:
• Fixed taskbar background customization when there's more than one monitor.
  • TranslucentTaskbar theme: Fixed menu flyout padding.

entry.title: RegEdit Disable Beep 1.0.0
entry.content:
RegEdit Disable Beep

When an invalid key is entered into the navigation bar, RegEdit plays a beep sound. This mod disables this sound.

entry.title: Windows 11 Taskbar Styler 1.3.3
entry.content:
• Added the TranslucentTaskbar theme.
  • Made styles defined later override styles defined earlier.
  • Empty values are now allowed. Setting an empty value with the XAML syntax clears the property value.
  • Added a workaround for setting FontWeight which didn't work.
  • Fixed null property value handling which could cause a crash.
  • Fixed background customization which was sometimes not applied on launch.

entry.title: RegEdit Fix "Copy Key Name" 1.0.0
entry.content:
RegEdit Fix "Copy Key Name"

Makes the "Copy Key Name" context menu option actually copy the name of the key instead of the path.

entry.title: RegEdit Auto Trim Whitespace on Navigation Bar 1.0.0
entry.content:
RegEdit Auto Trim Whitespace on Navigation Bar

This mod automatically trims whitespace on RegEdit's navigation bar.

If there is leading whitespace in the key entered in the navigation bar, then RegEdit doesn't navigate to the key and instead plays a beep sound.

This causes frustration when pasting a key into the navigation bar which has leading whitespace in it. This mod fixes that by automatically trimming the whitespace.

entry.title: Windows 11 Notification Center Styler 1.0.1
entry.content:
• Made styles defined later override styles defined earlier.
  • Empty values are now allowed. Setting an empty value with the XAML syntax clears the property value.
  • Added a workaround for setting FontWeight which didn't work.
  • Fixed the mod not working until some settings are changed.

entry.title: Windows 11 Start Menu Styler 1.1.3
entry.content:
• Added the TranslucentStartMenu theme.
  • Made styles defined later override styles defined earlier.
  • Empty values are now allowed. Setting an empty value with the XAML syntax clears the property value.
  • Added a workaround for setting FontWeight which didn't work.
  • Fixed null property value handling which could cause a crash.
